item.title: Theme Change - Beware of your dependencies
item.description: I had to switch the theme of the blog. This was unexpected and was a hard reminder that you should always be careful with your dependencies. You may rarely think about a theme being a dependency, but when I wanted to use the hello-friend theme under hugo 0.145.x, I discovered its no longer maintained (for over 3 years), the generation just failed. There were some deprecations, but they already became errors in the hugo version I was using.
